pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - MugMarket's Commitment to Your Privacy MugMarket HOME ABOUT US Cups Contact Privacy Policy At MugMarket, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how it is used, and the measures we take to safeguard it. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, shipping address, and payment details when you place an order on our website or subscribe to our newsletter. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process orders, communicate with you about your purchases, and provide customer support. We may also use your email address to send you promotional offers and updates about our products. Security Measures We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encrypting sensitive data and regularly updating our security protocols. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill orders (e.g., sharing shipping information with delivery services). Updates to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any updates. MugMarket website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - MugMarket's Guidelines for Website Use MugMarket HOME ABOUT US Cups Contact Terms and Conditions Welcome to MugMarket! By using this website, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions ("Terms"). Please read these Terms carefully before using the website. 1. Use of the Website MugMarket grants you a non-exclusive, limited license to access and use the website for your personal, non-commercial use. You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information, software, products, or services obtained from the website. 2. User Accounts (Optional: Include this section if MugMarket allows user accounts) If you create an account on MugMarket, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account. 3. Products and Services MugMarket offers a variety of mugs and potentially other related products ("Products"). The information provided on the website regarding the Products is for informational purposes only. We reserve the right to change prices, specifications, and availability of Products at any time without prior notice. 4. Orders and Payment (Optional: Include this section if MugMarket allows online purchases) If you place an order on MugMarket, you agree to pay the stated price for the Products and any applicable taxes. We accept several payment methods, which will be clearly listed at checkout. 5. Disclaimer **MugMarket strives to provide accurate and up-to-date information on this website, but we make no warranties or guarantees, expressed or implied, about the completeness, reliability, or accuracy of such information.** **The products offered on MugMarket are for informational purposes only. We are not responsible for any misuse of the products or any harm that may result from their use.** 6. Limitation of Liability **MugMarket shall not be liable for any damages arising from your use of this website or the Products. This includes, but is not limited to, direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, and punitive damages.** 7. Termination MugMarket reserves the right to terminate your access to the website at any time without notice for any reason, including, but not limited to, your violation of these Terms. 8. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws. 9. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and MugMarket regarding your use of the website. 10. Modifications to the Terms MugMarket reserves the right to modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. We will post the revised Terms on the website and update the "last updated" date below. You are responsible for checking the Terms periodically for any updates. By continuing to use the website after any changes to the Terms are posted, you agree to be bound by the revised Terms.
